definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: When you have the measles, you break out in spots.
sentences.chinese: 当你得麻疹时会出疹子。

sentences.english: You may get a rash and swollen glands.
sentences.chinese: 你可以出疹子和腺体肿胀。

sentences.english: A day later he developed a rash that was diagnosed as chicken pox and he was sent home.
sentences.chinese: 一天之后他出疹子，被诊断为水痘，他被送回家。

sentences.english: She dabbed the ointment on the rash.
sentences.chinese: 她将药膏轻抹在疹子上。

sentences.english: Let me have a look. How long have you had this rash?
sentences.chinese: 你先来检查一下。你出疹子有多长时间了？

sentences.english: He came in a rash today.
Allergy symptoms are headache, rash, shortness of breath.
sentences.chinese: 过敏症状包括疹子，气短，和头疼。

sentences.english: The bedridden victim also developed a rash on his chest and belly;
sentences.chinese: 这位受害者卧病在床，胸部和腹部还出了疹子。

sentences.english: Get treatment at the first sign of unexplained rash.
sentences.chinese: 一旦有长出不明疹子的迹象时就着手治疗。

sentences.english: Beautiful. This is really scratching my rash.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮，这东西挠我的疹子挠的好舒服。

sentences.english: The rash does not itch and it is usually located on the palms of the hands and soles of the feet.
sentences.chinese: 这些疹子并不发痒，通常局限于手掌心和脚掌底。

sentences.english: Some people mistake rashes caused by other viruses for measles.
sentences.chinese: 有些麻疹病人误会疹子是由其它病毒引起的。

sentences.english: Today, I woke up to four large pimples under both of my armpits.
sentences.chinese: 今天我醒来时发现每个腋窝下长了四个大疹子。

sentences.english: Some people have this disease called the "smell of urine rash" was.
sentences.chinese: 民间也有人把本病叫做“臊疹子”的说法。

sentences.english: Almost everyone who got smallpox developed a distinct rash.
sentences.chinese: 几乎得天花的所有人都会有明显的疹子。

definition: miliaria (type of skin disease)/prickly heat/sweat rash
